CustomField.formula: IF( AND( VALUE(LEFT(Self_Reported_Undergrad_Grad_Year__c,4)) <= YEAR(TODAY()) + 20, VALUE(LEFT(Self_Reported_Undergrad_Grad_Year__c,4)) >= YEAR(TODAY()) - 100 ), YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(LEFT(Self_Reported_Undergrad_Grad_Year__c,4)), NULL )
CustomField.label: Years Since Self-Reported UG Grad
